title: FS: T206 Wild Bill Donovan (throwing) SGC 5/60...

posts.post_title: SOLD: T206 Wild Bill Donovan (throwing) SGC 5/60...
posts.post_content:
Greetings gents.  I have a SGC 5/60 T206 Wild Bill Donovan (throwing) for sale.  Price is $SOLD firm.

I am more than willing to trade this card should you have any T207, T210, or Rube Waddell items I am looking for.

Please PM me if interested.  Thank you.
